# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

<!-- insertion marker -->
## [0.1.1](https://github.com/ryanlua/mkdocstrings-luau/releases/tag/0.1.1) - 2025-12-04

<small>[Compare with 0.1.0](https://github.com/ryanlua/mkdocstrings-luau/compare/0.1.0...0.1.1)</small>

## [0.1.0](https://github.com/ryanlua/mkdocstrings-luau/releases/tag/0.1.0) - 2025-12-04

<small>[Compare with first commit](https://github.com/ryanlua/mkdocstrings-luau/compare/b588637176958fdb9d5c721787cedc44de00ba90...0.1.0)</small>

### Features

- Initial release of mkdocstrings-luau handler
- Implement Luau parser for functions, modules, and documentation
- Add configuration options for the handler
- Add template rendering support with Material theme
- Support Python 3.10-3.15
